Bash(python -c "
from taxonomy_mapping import TAXONOMY_MAPPING, get_taxonomy_specialty, get_all_specialties

# Test a few known codes
test_codes = [''207K00000X'', ''207L00000X'', ''207Q00000X'']
print(''Testing taxonomy lookups:'')
for code in test_codes:
    entry = TAXONOMY_MAPPING.get(code)
    if entry:
        print(f''  {code}: {entry.specialty}'')
        print(f''    {entry.descriptive_name[:80]}...'')
    else:
        print(f''  {code}: NOT FOUND'')

print()
print(f''Sample of {len(get_all_specialties())} specialties:'')
for specialty in sorted(get_all_specialties())[:10]:
    print(f''  - {specialty}'')
")
